Articles.Content:
Hello out there!

I recognized that there is no multiplayer idea collection around here... so I decided to make a discussion on how a multiplayer DLC/mod should look and of course, how the timewarp problem should be solved.

Have fantasy and write down all of your ideas!!!

Oh, another one of these?

Dropping into Off-Topic, the devs are a bit fed up with this subject in the Development section, it comes up several times a week.
My response to the question/subject being discussed in this thread.
It could be like an iphone game with an 24/7 server: Your ship is going to arrive to the manouver node in 90 days.
My suggestion would be to add the ability to warp your own ship but thats it, like a literal warp device and you can increase the warp speed of your ship.

Sry didnt want to post this it was a mistake... Close please!

I am very sry guys!
